extendedInfo.description: An interactive Live Wallpaper which will create water ripples on the screen with every touch. The most realistic water ripples makes you think that your screen is made of water.The wallpaper uses OpenGL graphics engine to render images.Stones Underwater is an absolute delight to watch. A serene landscape with interaction brings you closer to nature.Instructions:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -> Stones UnderwaterDisclaimer: We have found a new way to monetize this app. This app may generate ads in the notification bar.
